formalpara.title: Status Reports
formalpara.para: Ed has started work on the benchmark, with an email thread giving some basic ideas of how to proceed with the benchmark in style. Specifically, he intends to have a spec written down by the time the semester starts. Aaron has completed the development and certification of Increment 3 of the Co-dfns compiler, with some caveats in terms of JIT compiling. The 4th increment is underway, but may not be done by the 1st of January.

formalpara.title: Tasks and Deadlines
formalpara.para: Aaron should attempt to have development, but not necessarily certification of Increment 4 complete by the 1st of January, while Ed should have the Benchmark specification complete by the start of the semester. Tim should complete his P423 work as quickly as possible.
